getPropertyRejectNull

public static java.lang.String getPropertyRejectNull(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                     java.lang.String key)
Returns the property value with the given key from the given Properties object. If the Properties object doesn't contain the property, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown

Parameters:

key -
Returns:
The value associated with the given key
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Properties doesn't contain the property with the given key
